thread.title: Hospitality of wonderful staff - Review
thread.title_full: Hospitality of wonderful staff - Review of Seafarers & International House, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: ruthr662
title: Hospitality of wonderful staff - Review
text: During the recent snow fall in NYC I was very well assisted in making reservations for a limo to LaGuardia by front desk staff. When my flight was cancelled I was made very welcome and was able to return to my room. Again staff provided me with extras to make me feel special. Great new amenities in redecorated room added to pleasant sense of home away from home.
